column5: So got to my cottage this weekend on Sparrow lake and wanted to do some pike fishing and got me a few smallies!... I was alone and had no one to take the pics of me holding them so that sucked  First day, on  http://img709.imageshack.us/img709/3206/imag0004md.jpg  and then the rest this Monday morning  http://img94.imagesh.../imag0005km.jpg This one here bit my line off the first time, so I put a leader on rigged the same plastic and he went for it again and I got my geaar back, YAY!!!  http://img542.images...3/imag0007f.jpg http://img546.images...7/imag0008h.jpg   And this one i took by accident but it looks kinda cool http://img542.images...5/imag0006p.jpg
Ah, Sparrow Lake. Still one of my favorite lakes. Good going on the nice pike.  Cheers.
Hows the fishing there thinking of trying a new spot instead of Muskoka.
Usually pretty good, there is a lot of boat traffic tho. Fish the shallow shores in the bays, and the mouths of the rivers and you should be pretty lucky.
